about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of flying in the skies of World War I with our retro-inspired flight simulator. Fly famous planes like the Fokker Dr1, Airco DH2, Albatros C.III, Fokker E.III, and the Sopwith Camel. Blue Sky Aces takes you back to those early days of flight where man and machine dueled over the skies of western Europe, high above the bloody stalemate in the trenches below. Battle your way through masses of enemy aircraft in close quarters dog fights, take on dangerous missions against observation balloons, and strafe soldiers and other ground targets.



Blue Sky Aces is designed to be quick and easy to learn, with flight physics that strike the perfect balance between realism and fun. This allows you to focus on flying and having fun, without needing to learn complex controls and systems. You don't even need a joystick or a high powered computer to play, a basic computer and a mouse is all that's required.



Key features of the demo include:
  • Play in either first person cockpit view, or third person chase camera perspectives.
  • Fun flight physics that are easy to learn, but difficult to master.
  • Unlock new aircraft and upgrades as the war progresses.
  • Hand crafted single player missions.
  • Quick mission builders to allow you to create your own missions.
  • Great looking stylized graphics.
  • Large and detailed open world maps.
  • Learn to fly with the tutorial missions.
  • Fly aircraft from Britain and Germany.
  • Variable difficulty settings to suite all skill levels.
  • Support for keyboard, mouse, gamepads, joysticks, and other HOTAS devices.
  • Leaderboards so you can compete with others.



Aircraft that are available in the demo:
  • Airco DH2
  • Albatros C.III
  • Fokker E.III
  • Fokker Dr1
  • Nieuport 17
  • Sopwith Camel

The game includes a flying tutorial to help get you started, and support for joysticks, gamepads, keyboard, and mouse. The controls can be easily rebound for HOTAS devices for improved immersion. Whether you’re an arcade gamer or a flight simulator enthusiast, Blue Sky Aces has something for everyone.

short_description: A retro inspired, stylized world war 1 flight simulator that puts you in control of some of the worlds first war planes. Zoom above the trenches as you engage the enemy in fierce close range dogfights, where any moment could be your last.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Ukrainian
